responses.rationale: The segment provides factual information about turkey numbers without intensifiers or risk-adjectives.
The segment provides factual information about chicken numbers and status without intensifiers or risk-adjectives.
The segment reports factual numbers of birds killed due to outbreaks using neutral language.
The segment reports factual numbers of birds killed due to cases using neutral language.
The segment reports factual information about infected farms and bird killing using neutral language.
The segment reports the location of cases using neutral language.
The segment reports the confirmation of the virus on a farm using neutral language.
The segment contains the intensifier 'so' directly modifying the risk-adjective 'infectious'.
The segment reports factual data on confirmed cases using neutral language.
The segment describes the cause of spread using neutral language.
